title: Tile metadata object
description: An object containing the metadata for a single tile

properties.description: The dictionary of properties, conforming to the tile metadata class. `properties` is required if and only if `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.class` is defined.

builtinProperties.description: A dictionary of properties, conforming to the built-in properties listed in `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.builtinProperties` rather than a class. `builtinProperties` is required if and only if `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.builtinProperties`.
